channel.title: software on Sounding
channel.description: Recent content in software on Sounding

item.title: Updated Audio Software
item.description: I’ve done some updates to the Audio Software page, including three new categories: “Looping and Performance”, “Free Players and Visualizers” and “Programming Languages”.

item.title: Nodal: Generative MIDI software
item.description: There’s a new generative music package out now called Nodal, which uses an object oriented interface that gives composers control over every aspect of MIDI in a string-it-together sort of Max/PD style. It will work with any MIDI capable synth, software or hardware, which means it works with most anything like Live, GarageBand or Logic as well as your outboard synths. My outboard synths with MIDI are long gone, and I do next to no work with software synths, but it does look interesting.
